short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step up, swing, and tap to sixes in Clicker Cricket! Build your legacy, conquer the cricket world. Will you be the legend?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step up to the virtual pitch and swing for the fences in Book Cricket Challenge! Experience the thrill of cricket in the palm of your hand as you tap your way to glory. Can you become the ultimate power hitter and dominate the game?

How to Play:

Tap the Screen: Tap the bat to hit the ball and score runs.
Challenge Yourself: Test your tapping skills and aim for high scores.

Tap your way to cricketing triumph and prove your skills in Book Cricket Challenge. Download now and unleash your batting prowess!

Note: Book Cricket Challenge is a casual clicker game designed to provide simple and addictive cricketing fun for players of all ages. Enjoy the excitement of cricket without the complexities of traditional sports simulations in your browser!
